'''An Idol's Last Line of Defense''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Sudden Shouting#Albert is Amenable To Reason|Albert is Amenable To Reason]]'' and persuade Barbara's fans to leave in ''[[A Very Special Beverage|The Cat's Tail's Specialty]].''

==Notes==
* This can be accomplished in separate playthroughs of Hangout Events, as progress is tracked.
